title: SOLD - FS: Tris Speaker 1914 Piedmont Art Stamp (T330-2)
author: Paul S

posts.post_title: SOLD - FS: Tris Speaker 1914 Piedmont Art Stamp (T330-2)
posts.post_content:
SOLD. Thanks to all who took a look.

Enjoys a similar design to T205, all but three players were 'borrowed'  from there. As thin as a postage stamp, the gummed backing was meant to be moistened and pasted - hence the paper loss on the reverse.  The front speaks for itself although there is a very slight horizontal crease that cuts across his neck (Oh, poor Tris!) that I imagine occurred upon peel-off. Very tough issue to find in any sort of decent condition, you would be hard pressed to find a Speaker at anywhere near this price. $139 includes shipping. Thanks for looking.
